title: Richard Branson-Backed SPAC Takes Grove Collaborative Public
sub_head: British billionaire will invest in the startup, a seller of sustainable consumer products, as part of the listing
body:
A blank-check company backed by British billionaire Richard Bransonâ€™s Virgin Group is merging with natural-consumer-products seller Grove Collaborative Inc. to take it public in a deal the companies value at $1.5 billion.
The San Francisco startup is combining with the special-purpose-acquisition company Virgin Group Acquisition Corp. II and plans to use the cash from the deal for eco-friendly home and personal-care innovation, retail expansion and customer growth.
